alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haakon and northeastern Jackson Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belvidere, or 11 miles east of Kadoka, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midland. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 159 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for south central, southwestern and west central South Dakota.
